participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I am a seamstress from the Midwest. I live in Celebration, Florida. I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills. My family means the world to me. I just graduated high school.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.background: I'd love to share a meal with someone who shares my passion for sketching. I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with. I wish I could say that I do, but my health is more important. I like to arm wrestle. I currently hold three jobs.

content.text: I am doing well. I just moved to Celebration, Florida from the Midwest.
Oh nice! I am from Florida. What brought you to Florida?
I just graduated high school and wanted to get out of the Midwest. I love Florida and I love the weather.
I am glad you like it here. I have lived in Florida my whole life. I am a seamstress and I love to sew.
That is really cool! I used to sew a lot when I was younger, but I have not sewn in a while.
You should get back into it! I love to make clothes and I am really good at it.
I would love to get back into it. I need some new clothes and I am sure you can help me out with that.
Of course I can! I would be happy to help you get back into sewing.
No problem! I am glad I could help.
Me too! This conversation has really made my day.
I am glad! I am always happy to meet new people and make new friends.
Me too! I love meeting new people and learning new things.
I am glad to hear that. I am excited to see what the future holds for you.
Thank you! I am excited to see what the future holds for me too.
